segments.text: Can you change American dollars into French francs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . How much do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fifty dollars . What is the exchange rate today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One dollar to five franc . Is that alright ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please . and you can cash my travelers check . Can ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I won ’ t to be here tomorrow . What are you business hours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 10 o ’ clock in the morning to 2 o ’ clock in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2
